Message:
How long it had lain there
or from where it had come
I knew not,

but a single key sat
perched in my bedroom.

The moment I touched it,
the knowledge of its origins
flowed into my mind.
This is a “Key of Contract.”

In this world,
there are beings called “Apostles.”

Ｗitches who have made
contracts with angels—
servants to the servants of God.

Those who gain particularly
strong power are called
“The Apostles of Sephirah,”

and are said to be granted
the ability to enact a single
miracle of their choosing.

The power of angels is
the power of God.

Thus, God’s law that the dead
cannot come back to life must
still be impossible to overturn.
But, what if...?

This may be just another
trap laid by a demon,
or the scheme of an angel.

But, the wish I should have
given up on long ago...
blossomed in my heart
once more.
